com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.metrics

Class HBaseInstrumentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.metrics.HBaseInstrumentation

  • public class HBaseInstrumentation
extends Object
    A container for Timers used to time HBaseClient requests.
    See Also:
    InstrumentedHBaseClient

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HBaseInstrumentation(HBaseClient client, com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry registry, String name)
      Initialises instrumentation for the given HBaseClient using the given MetricsRegistry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HBaseInstrumentation

        public HBaseInstrumentation(HBaseClient client,
                    com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry registry,
                    String name)
        Initialises instrumentation for the given HBaseClient using the given MetricsRegistry.
        Parameters:
        client - the client to create metrics for.
        registry - the registry to register the metrics with.
        name - the name of the client/scanner to register metrics under.
